--------------------------------------------------
Hi Ali

 

Sorry for the late reply, unfortunately a claim for 11K will be rejected per policy terms:

 

STP losses:

Warehouses: 2% of claim amount minimum SR 50,000/- any one accident or occurrence per location

All other locations: 1% of claim amount minimum of SR 35,000 Anyone accident or occurrence per locations.

Above deductibles will not be applicable for losses where minimum deductible as per SCB (SAMA) will be applied under

PAR Policy for same event

 

Regards

Dear /Ali

Thank you for your message and for bringing the matter to our attention. We are sorry to hear about the damages caused by the water leakage at your "Guess" store. 

Kindly note that such incidents fall under the scope of your store's insurance coverage. 

Therefore, we kindly ask you to contact your insurance provider directly and submit a claim, along with all related reports and documentation.

We remain available to support you with any additional information or assistance you may need from our side.

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Best regards,

 

 

 



 Abdulaziz Albishan

 Tenant Relations Manager - Riyadh Park



+966-9200-09034 Ext: 5015

chunks.text:
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 

Dear Abdulaziz,

 

I hope this message finds you well.

 

As previously discussed, our store "Guess" has suffered a significant water leakage from the ceiling into the storage room area. Unfortunately, this incident has caused extensive damage to our merchandise, with estimated losses exceeding 11,000 SAR.

 

Following a thorough technical assessment by our maintenance team, the source of the leak has been identified as originating from the first floor above our store, specifically from renovation activities taking place in the store directly above us on the second floor.

 

For your reference, we have attached photos and a detailed report outlining the findings and extent of the damage.

 

Given the circumstances, we respectfully request your urgent assistance to:

1.	Immediately address and rectify the cause of the leak to prevent any further damage.
2.	Coordinate with the responsible party to ensure full compensation for the affected merchandise.

 

We trust in your prompt support and cooperation to resolve this matter swiftly and efficiently.

 

Looking forward to your response.

Warm regards,

 

ALI BABKI

‑

عبدالعالي بابكي

SENIOR ASSOCIATE ‑ RSO

CHALHOUB GROUP ARABIA LIMITED COMPANY LLC

RIYADH

‑

SAUDI ARABIA

		
 

 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/Zx-RCN5zAUJyL67IzCAhyaTHZ?domain=chalhoubgroup.com/>

Subject: Water leakage 

 

Dear All,

I hope this message finds you well.

 

I would like to inform you that a water leakage was observed from the ceiling of the warehouse on 8- June , which unfortunately resulted in damage to some of the stored items, I informed the mall management and upon inspection, they discovered that the leak was coming from the store directly above us.

These damages are caused by the leak and their value amounts to (11,095 SR)

013627023916 (10) SR 410

013627023888 (10) SR 555

013627023916 (10) SR410

013627246052 (5.5) SR665
